title: Kodiak plans to scale autonomous trucking hardware and sensors with Bosch
description:
Bosch plans to supply Kodiak with a variety of hardware components, including sensors and vehicle actuation components.

The post Kodiak plans to scale autonomous trucking hardware and sensors with Bosch appeared first on The Robot Report.
